description: Flying physician, Dr Paul-Leon Rivard, paper company doctor at Clova, Quebec, has a practice overing 6000 patients scattered over 50,000 square km of the Abitibi region. He manages to cover the wilderness by plane, dog team and snowshoe, to help wherever needed.
